contractor_details.description: Details specific to the terms of an independent contractor relationship.

scope_of_work_summary.description: A brief summary of the services the contractor will provide.

compensation_summary.description: A summary of the payment terms (e.g., '$5,000 fixed fee', '$100 per hour', 'Paid upon completion').

term_of_agreement.description: The duration of the agreement (e.g., '6 months', 'Until project completion', 'Effective from X to Y').

termination_clause_summary.description: A brief summary of the conditions for termination, including any required notice period.
